ftp.client.FTPClient.connection

Interface FTPConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFTPConnection

    public interface FTPConnection
    Created by a.kalenkevich on 16.02.2017.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean abor()
      Send command 'abor' to the FTPServer which told him to abort current command execution.
      boolean ascii()
      Send command 'type A' to the FTPServer which told it to switch to the string type of the files.

      Send command 'type I' to the FTPServer which told it to switch to the binary type of the files.

      Send command 'cdup' to the FTPServer which told it to change working directory to upper.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        boolean connect(java.lang.String host,
                int port)
         throws FTPConnectionException
        Connect to FTPServer. Should be invoked before all command of this interface.
        Parameters:
        host - name of the remote service
        port - number on the remote services' port.
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

      • user

        boolean user(java.lang.String userName)
      throws FTPConnectionException
        Send command 'user' to the FTPServer with username parameter to the FTPServer
        Parameters:
        userName - username of the user from FTPServer
        Returns:
        a result of the command (if user exist returns true else false)
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

      • pass

        boolean pass(java.lang.String pass)
      throws FTPConnectionException
        Send command 'pass' to the FTPServer with pass parameter to the FTPServer. Use after user command.
        Parameters:
        pass - password of the user from the FTPServer.
        Returns:
        a result of the command (if password of the user is valid returns true else false)
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

      • quit

        boolean quit()
      throws FTPConnectionException
        Send command 'quit' to the FTPServer which told FTPServer to close connection.
        Returns:
        a result of the command (if connection is closed returns true else false)
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

      • rein

        boolean rein()
      throws FTPConnectionException
        Send command 'rein' to the FTPServer which told FTP to reconnect to the server with already known username and password.
        Returns:
        a result of the command (if connection is closed returns true else false)
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

      • rein

        boolean rein(java.lang.String userName,
             java.lang.String userPassword)
      throws FTPConnectionException
        Send command 'rein' which told FTP to reconnect to the server with username and password parameters.
        Parameters:
        userName - username of the user.
        userPassword - password of the user.
        Returns:
        a result of the command (if connection is closed returns true else false)
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

      • disconnect

        boolean disconnect()
            throws FTPConnectionException
        Send command 'quit' which told FTPServer to close connection. (The same as 'quit' command)
        Returns:
        a result of the command (if connection is closed returns true else false)
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

      • pwd

        java.lang.String pwd()
              throws FTPConnectionException
        Send command 'pwd' to the FTPServer which told him to return name of the working directory
        Returns:
        name of the working directory.
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

      • epsv

        boolean epsv()
      throws FTPConnectionException
        Send command 'epsv' to the FTPServer which told him to switch to active mode
        Returns:
        result of the command (if switch successfully returns true else false)
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

      • pasv

        boolean pasv()
      throws FTPConnectionException
        Send command 'pasv' to the FTPServer which told him to switch to passive mode
        Returns:
        result of the command (if switch successfully returns true else false)
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

      • port

        boolean port()
      throws FTPConnectionException
        Send command 'port' to the FTPServer which told him to switch to port mode
        Returns:
        result of the command (if switch successfully returns true else false)
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

      • abor

        boolean abor()
      throws FTPConnectionException
        Send command 'abor' to the FTPServer which told him to abort current command execution.
        Returns:
        result of the command (if execution aborted successfully returns true else false)
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

      • noop

        boolean noop()
      throws FTPConnectionException
        Send command 'noop' to the FTPServer which meaning no operation. (Used for testing of the connection)
        Returns:
        result of the command (if connection successful returns true else false)
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

      • stor

        boolean stor(java.io.File file,
             java.lang.String path)
      throws FTPConnectionException,
             java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Send command 'stor' to the FTPServer store the file into it's memory storage.
        Parameters:
        file - file which should be stored in remote storage.
        path - path of the file. It's a path where file will be stored
        Returns:
        result of the command (if stored successfully returns true else false)
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • storAsync

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Boolean> storAsync(java.io.File file,
                                                                    java.lang.String path)
        Send command 'stor' to the FTPServer store the file into it's memory storage. Analog of the stor command, but do it in async mode.
        Parameters:
        file - file which should be stored in remote storage.
        path - path of the file. It's a path where file will be stored
        Returns:
        promise of the command's status.

      • retr

        java.io.File retr(java.lang.String remoteFilePath,
                  java.lang.String localFilePath)
           throws FTPConnectionException
        Send command 'retr' to the FTPServer store the file into it's memory storage.
        Parameters:
        remoteFilePath - file path on the remove FTPServer which should be download.
        localFilePath - file path on the local machine where should be download.
        Returns:
        result of the command (if downloaded successfully returns true else false)
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

      • retrAsync

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.io.File> retrAsync(java.lang.String remoteFilePath,
                                                               java.lang.String localFilePath)
        Send command 'retr' to the FTPServer store the file into it's memory storage. Analog of the retr command, but do it in async mode.
        Parameters:
        remoteFilePath - file path on the remove FTPServer which should be download.
        localFilePath - file path on the local machine where should be download.
        Returns:
        promise of the command's status.

      • list

        java.util.List<FTPFile> list(java.lang.String pathname)
                      throws FTPConnectionException
        Send command 'list' to the FTPServer which told it to return current directory files.
        Parameters:
        pathname - path name of the directory.
        Returns:
        list of files of the directory with such name.
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

      • listAsync

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.List<FTPFile>> listAsync(java.lang.String pathName)
        Send command 'list' to the FTPServer which told it to return current directory files. Analog path command, but do it in async mode.
        Parameters:
        pathName - path name of the directory.
        Returns:
        promise of the command's status.

        Returns:
        result of the command.
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

      • rnfr

        boolean rnfr(java.lang.String fileName)
      throws FTPConnectionException
        Send command 'rnfr' to the FTPServer which told it which file should be renamed.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the new directory.
        Returns:
        result of the command.
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

      • rnto

        boolean rnto(java.lang.String fileName)
      throws FTPConnectionException
        Send command 'rnto' to the FTPServer which told it the new name of the file which should be renamed. Should be called after 'rnfr' command.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the new directory.
        Returns:
        result of the command.
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        result of the command.
        Throws:
        FTPConnectionException
